verses.verse: <S%H238>"Give<s%> <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and let me <S%H1696>speak;<s%> And let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

"Let my <S%H3948>teaching<s%> <S%H6201>drop<s%> as the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> My <S%H565>speech<s%> <S%H5140>distill<s%> as the <S%H2919>dew,<s%> As the <S%H8164>droplets<s%> on the <S%H1877>fresh<s%> <S%H1877>grass<s%> And as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> on the <S%H6212>herb.<s%>
"For I <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> <S%H1433>greatness<s%> to our <S%H430>God!<s%>

"The <S%H6697>Rock!<s%> His <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect,<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H4941>just;<s%> A <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H5766>injustice,<s%> <S%H6662>Righteous<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> is He.

"They have <S%H7843>acted<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly<s%> toward Him, [They are] not His <S%H1121>children,<s%> because of their <S%H9249>defect;<s%> [But are] a <S%H6141>perverse<s%> and <S%H6618>crooked<s%> generation.

"Do you <S%H2088>thus<s%> <S%H1580>repay<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O <S%H5036>foolish<s%> and <S%H3808>unwise<s%> <S%H2450><s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>? Is not He your Father who has <S%H1>bought<s%> you? He has <S%H7069>made<s%> you and <S%H6213>established<s%> you.

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H995>Consider<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> your father, and he will <S%H1>inform<s%> you, Your <S%H5046>elders,<s%> and they will <S%H2205>tell<s%> you.

"When the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> <S%H5157>gave<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> their <S%H5157>inheritance,<s%> When He <S%H6504>separated<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> He <S%H5324>set<s%> the <S%H1367>boundaries<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"For the Lord's <S%H2506>portion<s%> is His <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is the <S%H9112>allotment<s%> of His <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"He <S%H4672>found<s%> him in a <S%H4057>desert<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> And in the <S%H3214>howling<s%> <S%H8414>waste<s%> of a <S%H3452>wilderness;<s%> He <S%H5437>encircled<s%> him, He <S%H995>cared<s%> for him, He <S%H5431>guarded<s%> him as the <S%H380>pupil<s%> of His <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

"Like an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H5782>stirs<s%> up its <S%H7064>nest,<s%> That <S%H9550>hovers<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> its <S%H1469>young,<s%> He <S%H6566>spread<s%> His <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H3947>caught<s%> them, He <S%H5375>carried<s%> them on His <S%H84>pinions.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> <S%H5148>guided<s%> him, And <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H410>god<s%> with him.

"He made him <S%H7392>ride<s%> on the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And he <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H8570>produce<s%> of the <S%H9583>field;<s%> And He made him <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> from the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> And <S%H8081>oil<s%> from the <S%H2496>flinty<s%> <S%H6697>rock,<s%>

<S%H2529>Curds<s%> of <S%H1241>cows,<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> With <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> And <S%H352>rams,<s%> the <S%H1121>breed<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> With the <S%H2459>finest<s%> <S%H3629><s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> – And of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%> you <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H2561>wine.<s%>

"But <S%H3484>Jeshurun<s%> <S%H8080>grew<s%> <S%H8080>fat<s%> and <S%H1163>kicked<s%> – You are <S%H8080>grown<s%> <S%H8080>fat,<s%> <S%H5666>thick,<s%> and <S%H3780>sleek<s%> – Then he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> him, And <S%H9310>scorned<s%> the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
"They <S%H7065>made<s%> Him <S%H7065>jealous<s%> with <S%H2114>strange<s%> [gods;] With <S%H8441>abominations<s%> they <S%H3707>provoked<s%> Him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

"They <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to <S%H7700>demons<s%> who were not <S%H433>God,<s%> To <S%H430>gods<s%> whom they have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> <S%H2319>New<s%> [gods] who <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H7138>lately,<s%> Whom your fathers did not <S%H1>dread.<s%>
"You <S%H7876>neglected<s%> the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> who <S%H3205>begot<s%> you, And <S%H7911>forgot<s%> the <S%H410>God<s%> who <S%H9123>gave<s%> you <S%H9123>birth.<s%>
"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [this,] and <S%H5006>spurned<s%> [them] <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of His <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

"Then He <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H5641>hide<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> from them, I will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> their <S%H319>end<s%> [shall be;] For they are a <S%H8419>perverse<s%> generation, <S%H1121>Sons<s%> in whom is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H529>faithfulness.<s%>

'They have <S%H7065>made<s%> Me <S%H7065>jealous<s%> with [what] is not <S%H410>God;<s%> They have <S%H3707>provoked<s%> Me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>idols.<s%> So I will make them <S%H7065>jealous<s%> with [those who] are not a <S%H5971>people;<s%> I will <S%H3707>provoke<s%> them to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with a <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%>

For a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in My <S%H639>anger,<s%> And <S%H3344>burns<s%> to the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H8482>part<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> And <S%H398>consumes<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with its <S%H2981>yield,<s%> And <S%H3857>sets<s%> on <S%H3857>fire<s%> the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
'I will <S%H5595>heap<s%> <S%H9567>misfortunes<s%> on them; I will <S%H3615>use<s%> My <S%H2671>arrows<s%> on them.

'[They shall be] <S%H4198>wasted<s%> by <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and <S%H9237>consumed<s%> by <S%H7565>plague<s%> And <S%H4815>bitter<s%> <S%H6986>destruction;<s%> And the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of <S%H929>beasts<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> upon them, With the <S%H2534>venom<s%> of <S%H9102>crawling<s%> <S%H9102>things<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

<S%H4480>'Outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H7921>bereave,<s%> And <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H2315><s%> <S%H367>terror<s%> – <S%H1571>Both<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>man<s%> and <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> The <S%H3243>nursling<s%> with the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7872>gray<s%> <S%H7872>hair.<s%>
'I would have <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H6284>cut<s%> them to <S%H6284>pieces,<s%> I will <S%H7673>remove<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them from <S%H582>men,<s%>"

Had I not <S%H9076>feared<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> by the <S%H340>enemy,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> should <S%H9330>misjudge,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> they should <S%H559>say,<s%> "Our <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>triumphant,<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%>"'
"For they are a <S%H1471>nation<s%> lacking in <S%H6>counsel,<s%> And <S%H6098>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>understanding<s%> in them.
<S%H3863>"Would<s%> that they were <S%H2449>wise,<s%> that they <S%H7919>understood<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> That they would <S%H995>discern<s%> their <S%H319>future!<s%>

<S%H351>"How<s%> could <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5127>put<s%> <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousand<s%> to <S%H5127>flight,<s%> <S%H518>Unless<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3588><s%> their <S%H6697>Rock<s%> had <S%H4376>sold<s%> them, And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5462>given<s%> them up?
<S%H3588>"Indeed<s%> their <S%H6697>rock<s%> is not like our <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> Even our <S%H340>enemies<s%> themselves <S%H6414>judge<s%> this.

"For their <S%H1612>vine<s%> is from the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> And from the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah;<s%> Their <S%H6025>grapes<s%> are <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of <S%H7219>poison,<s%> Their <S%H811>clusters,<s%> <S%H4846>bitter.<s%>
"Their <S%H3196>wine<s%> is the <S%H2534>venom<s%> of <S%H8577>serpents,<s%> And the <S%H393>deadly<s%> <S%H7219>poison<s%> of <S%H6620>cobras.<s%>
'Is it not <S%H3647>laid<s%> up in <S%H3647>store<s%> with Me, <S%H2856>Sealed<s%> up in My <S%H214>treasuries<s%>?

<S%H5359>'Vengeance<s%> is Mine, and <S%H8005>retribution,<s%> In due <S%H6256>time<s%> their <S%H7272>foot<s%> will <S%H4131>slip;<s%> For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> And the <S%H6264>impending<s%> <S%H6264>things<s%> are <S%H2363>hastening<s%> upon them.'

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1777>vindicate<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> And will <S%H5162>have<s%> <S%H5162>compassion<s%> on His <S%H5650>servants;<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> He <S%H7200>sees<s%> that [their] <S%H3027>strength<s%> is <S%H235>gone,<s%> And <S%H657>there<s%> is <S%H657>none<s%> [remaining,] <S%H6113>bond<s%> or <S%H5800>free.<s%>
"And He will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H335>'Where<s%> are their <S%H430>gods,<s%> The <S%H6697>rock<s%> in which they <S%H2620>sought<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%>?

<S%H834>'Who<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> [And] <S%H8354>drank<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of their <S%H9331>libation<s%>? Let them <S%H6965>rise<s%> up and <S%H5826>help<s%> you, Let them be your <S%H9377>hiding<s%> <S%H9377>place!<s%>

<S%H7200>'See<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> that I, I am He, And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>god<s%> <S%H5973>besides<s%> Me; It is I who <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> and <S%H2421>give<s%> <S%H2421>life.<s%> I have <S%H4272>wounded,<s%> and it is I who <S%H7495>heal;<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> from My <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
<S%H3588>'Indeed,<s%> I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up My <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And <S%H559>say,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H8150>sharpen<s%> My <S%H1300>flashing<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H270>takes<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H4941>justice,<s%> I will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> on My <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And I will <S%H9608>repay<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> Me.

'I will make My <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H7937>drunk<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> And My <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> With the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> and the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> From the long-haired <S%H7218>leaders<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy.<s%>'

<S%H7442>"Rejoice,<s%> O <S%H1471>nations,<s%> [with] His <S%H5971>people;<s%> For He will <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of His <S%H5650>servants,<s%> And will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> on His <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And will <S%H3722>atone<s%> for His <S%H127>land<s%> [and] His <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he, with <S%H1954>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7760>"Take<s%> to your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5749>warning<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6680>command<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H6213>carefully,<s%> [even] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>

"For it is not an <S%H7386>idle<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> for you; <S%H3588>indeed<s%> it is your <S%H9132>life.<s%> And by <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> you shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are about to <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess.<s%>"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> that <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5927>"Go<s%> up to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5921>opposite<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5414>giving<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H272>possession.<s%>

"Then <S%H4191>die<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H5927>ascend,<s%> and be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H9415>people,<s%> as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H9415>people,<s%>

<S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H4603>broke<s%> <S%H4603>faith<s%> with Me in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of Meribah-kadesh, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you did not <S%H6942>treat<s%> Me as <S%H6942>holy<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"For you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> at a <S%H4480>distance,<s%> <S%H5048><s%> but you shall not <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5414>giving<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
